core

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Config
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConfig, java.io.Serializable

    public class Config
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConfig, java.io.Serializable
    the configuration-file-object for the game. No further documentation needed, since it consists only of setters and getters. Holds each property which is in the .ini file. The set methods are only to be used by the loadConfig method of the RessourceCache class
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jasper, Fabian
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
